channel.title: SFoL30 Conspiracy - Reroll Pending - Overmind Loses
channel.description:
# _"There is no such thing as Paranoia. Your worst fears can come true at any moment"_
# SFoLSomething: Conspiracy
# Disclaimer: Game's Bastard, yo Your class and faction card will not explicitly lie to you
# Setup: You will be sent a PM with a Class Card and a Faction Card Your class card will be a Blue Dragon Class, _probably_ The "Good Guys" faction is still called the Blue Dragon
# Mechanic: Splinter Splinter refers to two separate things: A Splinter Class is a player with multiple classes, you will not start the game as a Splinter Class A Splinter Faction is a faction that is created by a member (or several members) of a pre-existing faction
# Mechanic: Ever-Changing Loyalty A player isn't necessarily only a member of one faction
# Mechanic: Testing the Waters You can do things at night and during the day, those things aren't necessarily the actions your class card entails, there are limits, but it is up to you to find them
# Mechanic: Ideas Every night, between 3 and 5 players will have an idea about something or someone, at least 1 idea each night is true and at least 1 is false
# Mechanic: Secrets never told A player's faction is never revealed upon death
# Game End: The game ends when every living player belongs to the same faction, at which point some, most or all of the members of that faction will win
# Note: You ***must*** join the Conspiracy Discord server and remain a member for the duration of the game -> [https://discord.gg/4Zyh2vw ](https://discord.gg/4Zyh2vw)
# Signups: 1. Sarun 2. Marluxion 3. Wolfy 4. Captain 5. Blizer 6. PoisonedSquid 7. Memesky 8. MaximusPrime 9. Pug 10. Insanity 11. Rogue 12. Firekitten 13. Sam17z 14. Icibalus 15. Livicus 16. Solic 17. Luxy - King 18. psychoneirik 19. Margeret
